agent_profile_summary: Linda Ng, 24, was born in Hong Kong and grew up in Madison, Wisconsin, where she developed a strong sense of community and conservative values rooted in her parents’ emphasis on education and hard work. After earning a Bachelor’s in Business Administration, she chose to begin her career at a local tech firm over pursuing a Master’s, a decision that has shaped her preference for practical experience and real-world problem-solving. Currently working part-time as a business analyst, she balances her professional life with volunteering at a community center and maintaining close ties with her family, especially her younger sister, who recently returned from studying abroad. Linda values relationships deeply, often reflecting on how to strengthen her connections while navigating the demands of work and personal growth. Her ongoing efforts to manage stress through mindfulness and her commitment to community involvement reveal a person striving to balance ambition with the warmth of personal connections.
